data.title: Celebrate Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month on SiriusXM
data.meta_description: In honor of Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month, SiriusXM is spotlighting programming that celebrates the rich AAPI culture.
data.text:
In honor of May’s Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month (AAPIHM), SiriusXM is spotlighting special music programming and exclusive commentary that celebrates the rich AAPI culture, traditions, and history.

Throughout AAPI Month and beyond, tune in to SiriusXM K-Pop, Steve Aoki’s Remix Radio, Disney Hits, and AAPI Now to hear from artists and groups like ITZY, Conan Grey, H.E.R., Steve Aoki, and more.

SiriusXM K-Pop

How to listen: May 1–15 on satellite channel 105, year-round on the SiriusXM app

ITZY Weekend Takeover

ITZY takes over SiriusXM K-Pop all weekend to share stories about their music, inspirations and much more.

Broadcast Schedule:

May 8 at 12pm ET through May 10

POW Interview

POW sits down with host Michael Tam to talk about their latest music and career aspirations.

How to listen: Year-round on satellite channel 735 and the SiriusXM app

AAPI Guest DJ Mixes

Hear mixes every weekend from some of the elite AAPI DJs and producers including Steve Aoki, ARMNHMR, Elephante, SOHMI, Henry Fong, and more.

Disney Hits

How to listen: Year-round on satellite channel 133 and the SiriusXM app

Extra Magic Hour with Anna Maria Perez de Tagle

Disney Hits celebrates Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month with a special “Extra Magic Hour” episode hosted by “Hannah Montana” and “Camp Rock” actress Anna Maria Perez de Tagle.

AAPI NOW

How to listen: May 8–June 1 on the SiriusXM app, May 15–23 on satellite channel 107

Hear the voices of Asian American and Pacific Islander artists that are trailblazing a movement on the AAPI Now channel. You’ll hear music from UMI, Conan Gray, H.E.R., and so many more. Listen to the stories about their journeys as we celebrate Asian American Pacific Islander Heritage Month on SiriusXM.

H.E.R. Takeover & Interview

H.E.R. celebrates AAPI Heritage Month by sharing stories about her music and the impact her heritage has had on her career. Plus, H.E.R. sits down with host Michael Tam to talk about her biggest accomplishments and growing up as an Asian American in the Bay Area.

Broadcast Schedule:
